title: 想快速获得金粒怎么办
txt_content: 用金粒给服务器宣传贴顶贴有奖励

replies.author: hj2629638
replies.txt_content: 以前还能靠签到的

replies.author: ljl10844
replies.txt_content: 我也想知道呢，怎么才能快速获得金颗呢，等着下mod呢，让我水一下

replies.author: Kafeix.cn
replies.txt_content: 告诉你吧 去问答版块 采纳你的问题就能有赏金

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 没什么一技之长的话等别人发锭吧，记得不要当伸手党

replies.author: a25624186
replies.txt_content: 回答问题吧 - -多参考些资料

replies.author: mhc616@sina.com
replies.txt_content: 回复，比如说我现在回复了你，我就会喜加一

replies.author: wangmcptr
replies.txt_content: 坚持每天做任务

replies.author: 丨亡人丨
replies.txt_content: 任务怎么做

replies.author: 丨亡人丨
replies.txt_content: 任务怎么做啊，有人教我吗

replies.author: 诗钰啊
replies.txt_content: 致富卡鸭兄弟，体验一夜回到解放前的快感

replies.author: Redstone_ray
replies.txt_content: 顶帖有奖励？你什么服务器，小心违反规则啊

replies.author: 夏了个沫
replies.txt_content: 发帖，打赏 大概就这样子

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 问答版，解决一个问题至少30金粒

replies.author: jianpeiguo

replies.txt_content:
疯狂水贴喜+1
然后被混乱发卡~

replies.author: hhqpalzm
replies.txt_content: 问答版  每日签到  任务

replies.author: 白焰BaiYan
replies.txt_content: 每日任务了解一下

replies.author: niuzhenglin
replies.txt_content: 我也想要

replies.author: cog12
replies.txt_content: 这样啊11

replies.author: Milim_Nava
replies.txt_content: 回复一次 金粒+1

replies.author: A一笑而过
replies.txt_content: 水帖呗，学习贴吧老哥

replies.author: a6513375
replies.txt_content: 我都是做每日任务弄到的

replies.author: AkkLive
replies.txt_content: 回复吧或签到! 可获得金粒 还有做任务吧
6级之后签到才会给金粒，之前的话只给一个钻石

replies.author: Jannik
replies.txt_content: 茶馆回复一金粒，其他回复2金粒，想我一样water就行了
金粒太难搞了

replies.author: Fofollker
replies.txt_content: 每天回复做任务呗
